info.name: Jira API (Standout)
info.description:
**Do not query the Jira API via Postman. This needs to be done via SALAMe.**

Read more at [https://support.fivetran.com/hc/en-us/articles/360056207234--INTERNAL-JiraRequest-Script](https://support.fivetran.com/hc/en-us/articles/360056207234--INTERNAL-JiraRequest-Script)

Example

salame jobs create  standard jira_request -c ///

item.name: Do not query Jira in Postman
